def-en: In the context of negative sampling, the process of creating a negative sample by replacing the subject $s$ in a triple $(s,p,o)$ with another node.
def-ga: I gcomhthéacs frith-shamplála, an próiseas a bhaineann le frith-shampla a chruthú tríd an ainmní $a$ in abairt thriarach $(a,f,c)$ a ionadú le nód eile.

prov.malartaigh: féach ar an téarma 'to corrupt / malartaigh'

notes: Féach ar an téarma 'to corrupt / malartaigh'.
Féach chomh maith ar an téarma 'subject / ainmní'.
